content: Reply in this thread with your 5 picks (going with the odds listed) Who ever gets all 5 correct, I'll post on another thread, naming you the best ncaa football capper, at least for this particular week.  Do not post picks after the game has started or your pick won't count.  WashOreg st -1.5TexasIowa st +7.5Kansas st Kansas +10Georgia stLSU -31.5FloridaMissouri -10.5
